description: Massaman Curry Vegetables with from scratch Massaman curry sauce that has peanut butter, coconut milk, Thai Malay Spices and amazing flavor. Make this 30 minute vegan massaman curry. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. Easy Weeknight Dinner
name: Massaman Curry Vegetables
recipeIngredient: 2 tsp coconut oil (or organic canola oil)
1/2 loaded cup sliced onion (red or white)
2 cups cauliflower florets (chopped small, about 1.5 inch)
2 Tbsp red curry paste (I use thai kitchen)
1/4 tsp crushed fennel seeds (or use ground star anise)
3 Tbsp peanut butter or almond butter (or use a 1/4 cup roasted peanuts and blend to a paste with a little water or oil)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, add oil and heat at medium heat. Add onion and cook for 4 minutes.
Add ginger, garlic, bell pepper, cauliflower, green beans, 1/4 tsp salt and mix. Cover and cook for 4 minutes.
Add the carrots, curry paste, spices and mix and cook for 2 minutes to roast the spices and paste.
Add peanut/almond butter, sugar, 1/4 tsp salt, tamarind, coconut milk and water and mix well.
Cover and cook for 6 to 8 minutes until the curry thickens a bit and the veggies are tender crisp or tender to preference. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Garnish with basil. Serve hot over rice.

video.description:
Massaman Curry Veggies with homemade Massaman curry sauce. 1 Pot 30 Mins.
FULL RECIPE: https://www.veganricha.com/2014/05/massaman-curry-vegetables-gluten-free.html

From scratch Massaman curry sauce that has peanut butter, coconut milk, Thai Malay Spices and amazing flavor. 30 Minute vegan Massaman Curry. Vegan Gluten-free Soy-free Recipe. No Tofu.

Massaman curry is a favorite in the house right after green and red curries. Massaman has a Malay influence on the curry and hence has spices.
The curry gets even more delicious the next day when the spices have had time to sit and infuse a more flavor. Add tofu or seitan or chickpeas to this curry for variations. 

This Recipe is also in my Everyday Kitchen Cookbook. 
BUY MY COOKBOOK: http://www.veganricha.com/vegan-richas-everyday-kitchen
